channel.title: Westbury's Weblog.
channel.description: A place on the internet where you, dear reader, can peruse the inner machinations of my mind. Here you will find posts and essays on practical politics, coding and some philosophy & science.

item.title: I do apologise
item.description: Over the last few weeks I have been completely snowed under by my relocation to Hertfordshire and the beginning of my new job. It’s been horrendously busy but I’m pretty excited that I’m finally actually making a contribution to modern civilisation (read: making money). Unfortunately for you people, there are a couple of essays in the pipeline, one being a shameless plug for my pet project of an open think tank. Cheers for reading and all that, hopefully I’ll churn those essays out soon.

item.title: We can legislate it for you wholesale
item.description:
Think Thanks. What are they? These institutions

Some Think Tanks provide an invaluable service to policy and industry. For example, RUSI, a defence and foreign policy think tank, provides research into the future of warfare allowing the government and defense firms to

Unfortunately many Think Tanks are run and backed by large corporate entities, this means that some of our most influential policy makers are in the pockets of the rich.

item.title: The Cooperative Manifesto
item.description:
‘There is no such thing as society’

WORKERS OF THE WORLD, COOPERATE.
